summary: Experienced accountant with extensive background in accounts payable/receivable, tax administration, payroll support, and government collections. Proficient in MAS90, NetSuite, QuickBooks, Oracle, and Excel; adept at financial reporting, month-end close, and enforcing compliance across multiple states and government programs.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Handle invoicing & receivables (~$15M annual sales); review credit applications and terms; manage vendor/customer records and tax exemption certificates; month-end reconciliations for bank and loan accounts; file sales tax returns across six states; manage company credit card expenses; review GL, expenses, fixed assets, and COGS; payroll support; inventory, warranties and service case records; sales and commission reports.

experience.title: Sales & Use Tax Administrator
experience.description: File ~-$1M monthly sales and use tax returns across 11 states; prepare tax deposits and quarterly returns per state guidelines; month-end closure for tax ledgers; review short pays for tax issues; assess customer taxability; maintain exemption certificates; support branch offices; assist with AR/AP; provide sales tax guidance.

experience.title: Accounting Associate
experience.description: Accounts payable for HQ and three operational centers; portfolio balancing for major clients (Citibank, Sallie Mae); bank reconciliations; import financial data into MAS90; ensure compliance; perform timely monthly/quarterly/year-end closes; coordinate with departments vs clients; prepare journal entries; AR for multiple clients.

experience.title: Government Collections Representative
experience.description: Helped initiate department, creating policies; led a 15+ member team; managed portfolio of 300-800 accounts; focus on SBA loans and government debts (DHS, DoD, HHS); policy development, training new associates; account history, payment history, loan refinance; negotiate repayments; perform asset investigations and wage garnishment; provide account verification for litigation.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Real Estate & Finance
